name: l o f i
description:
GameJam submission.

Theme: Failing is Progress

For this GameJam, I made a simple rhythm game where the consequence of failing is that the song fast forwards, thereby progressing the level forcibly. This game is intended to be a very zen, relaxing experience so there are no distractions like menus, scores, etc. 

Use the arrow keys to play with keyboard. XArcade joystick is also supported.

Please leave a comment!
